Author: SpheneDev
Name: Sphene
Description: Through the power of Living Memory, this plugin harmonizes your Penumbra modifications and Glamourer configurations across all connected souls, ensuring endless synchronization in your shared digital realm.
Punchline: Become Endless. Return to Living Memory.
Changelog:
- Added a 5 second clicking Delay to the Reconnect and Incognito Button to prevent accidentaly Spamming it.
 - Improvement for Acknowledgment System Added Monitor Window to track pending acknowledgemends.
 - You can open it with /sphene Ack
 - Some More Bug Fixes :)
